name: Five Nights At Junky's
description:
In 1986 , in the Junky's Music Pizzeria , there is 3 animatronics :

Junky (The green one) ,

Funky (The blue one) ,

Minny (The pink one).

#fnaf #fangame #horror #fnaf

We are in 1986 , The Junkier And Funkier Pizzeria has been closed . 1 Year after the incident , The animatronics has been Upgraded and the pizzeria's name are :

Junky's Music Pizzeria


the two animatronics (Junkier and Funkier) will be destroyed EXCEPT Junkier, who will be locked in a room in Junky's pizzeria. #fnaf #fnaf
